testcase.name: verifyLoginCredentials

failure.message:
Found 8 accessibility violations: 1) ARIA role must be appropriate for the element: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/aria-allowed-role?application=axeAPI a) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]"] Fix any of the following: role presentation is not allowed for given element
2) Elements must have sufficient color contrast: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/color-contrast?application=axeAPI a) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]",".rc-anchor-invisible-text > span"] Fix any of the following: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a90e2, font size: 9.8pt, font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","strong"] Fix any of the following: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a90e2, font size: 9.8pt, font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
3) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) ["h4"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
4) <html> element must have a lang attribute: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/html-has-lang?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute
5) Form elements must have labels: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/label?application=axeAPI a) ["#username"] Fix any of the following: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label> Form element does not have an explicit <label> Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty
6) Page must have one main landmark: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/landmark-one-main?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page does not have a main landmark
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","html"] Fix all of the following: Page does not have a main landmark
7) Page must contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
8) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/region?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
java.lang.AssertionError: Found 8 accessibility violations: 1) ARIA role must be appropriate for the element: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/aria-allowed-role?application=axeAPI a) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]"] Fix any of the following: role presentation is not allowed for given element
2) Elements must have sufficient color contrast: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/color-contrast?application=axeAPI a) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]",".rc-anchor-invisible-text > span"] Fix any of the following: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a90e2, font size: 9.8pt, font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","strong"] Fix any of the following: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #4a90e2, font size: 9.8pt, font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
3) Heading levels should only increase by one: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/heading-order?application=axeAPI a) ["h4"] Fix any of the following: Heading order invalid
4) <html> element must have a lang attribute: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/html-has-lang?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: The <html> element does not have a lang attribute
5) Form elements must have labels: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/label?application=axeAPI a) ["#username"] Fix any of the following: aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Form element does not have an implicit (wrapped) <label> Form element does not have an explicit <label> Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty
6) Page must have one main landmark: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/landmark-one-main?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page does not have a main landmark
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","html"] Fix all of the following: Page does not have a main landmark
7) Page must contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
b) ["iframe[title=\"reCAPTCHA\"]","html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
8) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/region?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
